Tucson's heart nearly breaks when he hears the sadness in Elita's voice.  H=
e wished he had better news for her.  He turns to Lord Elder and Kup with t=
he same soft expression on his face.

"I - wish it didn't have to - come to=
 this.  Poor Elita.  No one - should ever lose loved ones to - the greed of=
 corrupted forces.  Before I - get my energon, I - think someone needs - a =
shoulder to lean on."

Still putting others before himself, Tucson slowly w=
alks over to Elita and gently kneels down to her, hearing where she is with=
 his supurb hearing.  

" I want you to know that I fully intend to keep my=
 promise to you.  It may take a long time, but Elita, if I have to lose my =
spark to give you back your parents, I'll do that.  I won't give up until y=
ou're reunited with your family.  Right now, Rodimus isn't himself, and I s=
uspect your mother will not be herself either.  Perceptor - has altered you=
r father's programming to the point  where he considers us enemies.  Right =
now, Rodimus would like nothing more than to make scrap metal out of all of=
 us.  So - before I can get him to you I - have to find a way to reverse th=
e shell program Perceptor put over him.  And that I assure you, is the trut=
h."

He gently takes her hand.

" Until your father and your mother returns=
, I want you to know that if you need someone to support you, I'll be more =
than happy to be that figure.  I've got plenty of room in my heart to care =
for anyone who needs my help."

He gets back on his feet, and gently rubs E=
lita's shoulder.  He stumbles back up and heads over to Kup and Lord Elder.=


" Next time we encounter Cyclonus, Hydras and Scourge, I personally want =
to deal wtih Cyclonus myself.  He leached off of Rodimus and thus has voila=
ted one of our own.  He won't get away with it, I won't let him get away wi=
th it!"

He now paces with a slight pitch of anger.

" And as far as Hydras=
, Perceptor and Scourge are concerned, I want them lured out into the open =
and I want full stasis locks on all of them.  After that, I want them restr=
ained permanently and sent to Char where they can do no further harm.  Afte=
r that, I strongly suggest we take over the dark fortress, clean it out, an=
d convert it into shelter which can be used to shelter those who have nothi=
ng over their heads. It's the least I can do, to - return something to the =
innocent which - has been taken away from them".  

He sighs.

" Just be su=
re no one is killed in the process.  I fully intend to do this the honorabl=
e way."
